content:
I think I can help you with that. Since you're looking for a villa that can accommodate a large group, I'd recommend searching for villas that have at least 5-6 bedrooms. You can also filter your search by location, price range, and amenities.

For instance, you could look for villas in destinations like Orlando, Hawaii, or Lake Tahoe, which are popular for family vacations. You could also consider villas with private pools, game rooms, or outdoor spaces to keep everyone entertained.

When it comes to booking, make sure to read reviews from previous guests to get an idea of the villa's condition and service. You should also clarify the pricing, payment terms, and any additional fees or taxes.

If you're looking for a more personalized experience, you could consider working with a travel agent who specializes in villa rentals. They often have access to a vast network of properties and can provide valuable insights and recommendations.

Lastly, don't forget to ask about any amenities for kids
